item.title: Telcos investment recovery in limbo as tariff hike backfires, price war with satcom services likely in 2025 | Company Business News - Mint
item.description:
Telcos investment recovery in limbo as tariff hike backfires, price war with satcom services likely in 2025

Publication Date: Not specified | Source: Live Mint

Private telecom operators in India are struggling with recovering investments due to customer losses after tariff hikes and competition from satellite service providers like Starlink.

  • Private operators invested around ₹70,000 crore in telecom infrastructure this year.
  • Subscriber loss reached about 2.6 crore due to a price increase of 10-26%.
  • BSNL gained customers by refraining from tariff increases.
  • The push for 5G services highlights the need for operators to attract and maintain customer interest.
  • Concerns grow over satellite broadband threatening the market share of existing telecom companies.
  • Political implications arise from spectrum allocation controversies.
“5G deployment has been a game-changer. We've witnessed a significant surge in 5G base transceiver stations.” - DIPA

The telecom sector faces a critical juncture as it navigates investment recovery, subscriber retention, and emerging competition.

item.title: Keerthy Suresh Shocked As Paparazzi Call Her 'Dosa', Baby John Actress Says 'Aur Dosa Mujhe...' | Watch - News18
item.description:
Keerthy Suresh Reacts to Paparazzi Calling Her 'Dosa'

Date: December 28, 2024

Source: News18

Keerthy Suresh, who recently made her Bollywood debut with 'Baby John', was caught off guard when paparazzi referred to her as 'Dosa', leading to an amusing interaction.

  • Keerthy Suresh posed for paparazzi in Mumbai.
  • Paparazzi mistakenly called her 'Kriti', which she corrected to 'Keerthy'.
  • One photographer humorously called her 'Dosa', which annoyed her.
  • Keerthy responded, stating she's not 'Keerthy dosa' but 'Keerthy Suresh' and humorously added that she does like dosa.
  • Despite mixed reviews for 'Baby John', Keerthy's performance has been praised.
  • Keerthy Suresh married her long-time partner Antony on December 12, 2024.
“Keerthy Suresh’s Bollywood debut as Meera is another highlight of the film. Her nuanced dialogue delivery and expressive acting make her a scene-stealer.”

In light of the amusing encounter, Keerthy's charm continues to resonate with her audience.

item.title: 'Nitish Reddy’s first-class average is 22': Sanjay Manjrekar marvels at youngster's knock - The Times of India
item.description:
Sanjay Manjrekar Praises Nitish Reddy's Maiden Test Century

Publication Date: Not specified, Source: Times of India

Nitish Kumar Reddy's remarkable performance in the fourth Test against Australia has drawn acclaim from former cricket stars, showcasing his ability to excel despite a modest first-class average.

  • Nitish Reddy scored an unbeaten 105 runs from 176 balls, contributing significantly to India's total of 358/9 by the end of Day 3.
  • His partnership with Washington Sundar was pivotal, worth 127 runs for the eighth wicket.
  • Former cricketer Sanjay Manjrekar expressed amazement at Reddy's maturity, noting his first-class average of only 22.
  • Other cricketers, including Irfan Pathan, highlighted the historic nature of the partnership between Reddy and Sundar, which endured over 300 deliveries.
  • Reddy's performance provides hope for India's prospects in Test cricket.
“There has never been an instance where the number 8 and 9 batsman in the Indian team have played over 300 deliveries.” - Irfan Pathan

Reddy's innings is seen as a significant step for Indian cricket, combining technique and determination to inspire future generations of players.

item.title: How NASA's Parker Solar Probe got closer to the Sun than ever before on December 24? - India TV News
item.description:
How NASA's Parker Solar Probe got closer to the Sun than ever before on December 24

Date: December 24, 2024

Source: India TV News

NASA's Parker Solar Probe is set to achieve a monumental milestone with its closest approach to the Sun on December 24, 2024, reaching just 6.1 million kilometers from the Sun's surface.

  • This flyby marks the 22nd close encounter of the mission.
  • The probe will reach speeds of 692,000 kilometers per hour and study the Sun's corona.
  • NASA plans to provide updates post-flyby through its channels.
  • The mission will conclude in 2025 with a total of 24 solar encounters.
"The Parker Solar Probe will fly through the Sun's outer atmosphere, known as the corona, at an incredible speed of 692,000 kilometres per hour."

This landmark flyby paves the way for future data collection during a period of intense solar activity expected throughout 2025.

item.title: 7 Majestic Images Of Black Holes Captured By NASA - Times Now
item.description:
7 Majestic Images Of Black Holes Captured By NASA

Publication Date: Dec 28, 2024 | Source: Times Now

This article presents stunning imagery of black holes captured by NASA, highlighting groundbreaking discoveries in the field of astrophysics.

  • A Dust-Bound Supermassive Black Hole surrounded by swirling debris.
  • A black hole releasing two bubbles of hot gas observed 900 million light-years away.
  • Illustration depicting the potential origins of supermassive black hole seeds.
  • Hubble imagery capturing ghostly green filaments within the Teacup galaxy.
  • An artistic portrayal of a binary black hole in the closest quasar to Earth.
  • Quasar energy impacting galaxy structures through high-speed material expulsion.
  • NGC 5548 exhibits unique behavior obstructing X-ray emissions from a supermassive black hole.
“These stunning images shed light on the complex behaviors of black holes and their interactions with surrounding galaxies.”

These images not only enhance our understanding of black holes but also inspire curiosity and encourage further exploration in space science.

item.title: Best mobile phones in India under ₹40,000 (December 2024): OnePlus 12R, Vivo T3 Ultra and more | Mint - Mint
item.description:
Best Mobile Phones in India Under ₹40,000 (December 2024)

Publication Date: December 2024
Source: Live Mint

With a plethora of new phone launches each month, selecting the best devices under ₹40,000 can be challenging. This article outlines top choices from brands such as OnePlus, Vivo, Realme, and Motorola.

  • OnePlus 12R: Features a 6.78-inch AMOLED ProXDR display, Snapdragon 8 Gen 2 chipset, 5,500mAh battery, and a 50MP camera.
  • Vivo T3 Ultra: 6.78-inch 3D curved AMOLED display, powered by MediaTek Dimensity 9200+, boasting a 50MP front camera.
  • Realme GT 6: 6.78-inch LTPO AMOLED display, Snapdragon 8s Gen 3 chipset, with a triple camera setup including a 50MP main sensor.
  • Motorola Edge 50 Pro: Snapdragon 7 Gen 3 chipset, 6.7-inch FHD+ P-OLED display, and a triple-camera system with a 50MP front camera.

This list enables consumers to make informed choices when purchasing a new smartphone within this price range.

item.title: Marathi Actress Urmila Kothare's Vehicle Runs Over Labourers In Mumbai, 1 Killed - News18
item.description:
Urmila Kothare's Vehicle Runs Over Labourers In Mumbai, 1 Killed

Date: December 28, 2024 Source: News18

In a tragic accident, Marathi actress Urmila Kothare’s car ran over two labourers in Mumbai’s Kandivali area, killing one and seriously injuring the other. The actor and her driver were also injured in the accident.

  • The accident occurred after Kothare was returning home from a shoot.
  • The car was reportedly driven at high speed before losing control.
  • A case has been registered against the car driver, and an investigation is ongoing.
  • Kothare's vehicle was damaged in the accident, but she sustained only minor injuries.

“Kothare’s car hit two labourers who were engaged in Metro rail work under the Poisar Metro station in Kandivali east shortly after midnight. While labourer died, another was seriously injured,” a police official stated.

This accident underscores the importance of road safety and the potential consequences of high-speed driving.

item.title: Cochin Shipyard bags Adani Ports tug boat order, deal value estimated at ₹450 crore | Company Business News - Mint
item.description:
Cochin Shipyard Wins ₹450 Crore Tug Boat Order from Adani Ports

Publication Date: December 27, Source: Live Mint

Adani Ports has ordered eight tug boats from Cochin Shipyard Ltd, valued at ₹450 crore, to enhance its maritime infrastructure.

The order consists of eight 70 T Bollard Pull ASD Tugs, expected to be delivered from December 2026 to August 2028.

  • Adani Ports and SEZ orders eight tug boats from Cochin Shipyard.
  • The deal is valued at ₹450 crore, falling under the “Significant” category of ₹200 to ₹500 crore.
  • Tug deliveries are set to begin in December 2026.
  • This order will expand Adani's tug boat fleet to 152.
  • Adani aims to strengthen local manufacturing with this collaboration.
“This collaboration signifies our commitment to enhancing maritime infrastructure in India and demonstrates our confidence in our nation's PSUs.” - Ashwani Gupta, CEO of Adani Ports

This significant order highlights the growing cooperation between private companies and public sector units in India’s maritime sector.

item.title: ‘Totally insulted by the present government’: Rahul Gandhi on Manmohan Singh’s cremation - The Times of India
item.description:
‘Totally insulted by the present government’: Rahul Gandhi on Manmohan Singh’s cremation

Publication Date: January 27, 2023 | Source: Times of India

Rahul Gandhi expressed strong feelings regarding the treatment of Manmohan Singh’s legacy by the current government during the funeral of the former Prime Minister, which took place at Delhi's Nigambodh Ghat.

  • Manmohan Singh passed away at the age of 92 on January 26, 2023.
  • The cremation was attended by several dignitaries, including President Droupadi Murmu and Prime Minister Narendra Modi.
  • Rahul Gandhi stated that the government's actions towards Manmohan Singh were insulting, reflecting on his contribution to the nation.
  • Singh was given full state honors, including a 21-gun salute.
  • The event highlighted the divide between current political sentiments and the respect for past leadership.
“The government has totally insulted his legacy.” - Rahul Gandhi

This event highlights the ongoing political discourse in India regarding respect for former leaders and the legacy they leave behind.

item.title: Sikandar teaser: Salman Khan annihilates army of samurais with shotguns, fans say 'mass ka baap is here'. Watch - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Sikandar teaser: Salman Khan annihilates army of samurais with shotguns

Date: Dec 28, 2024

Source: Hindustan Times

The teaser for director AR Murugadoss’ film Sikandar featuring Salman Khan and Rashmika Mandanna has been released, showcasing intense action sequences and a thrilling glimpse of the movie.

  • The teaser was released a day late due to the death of former Prime Minister Manmohan Singh.
  • The 1-minute-41-second video highlights Salman’s character entering a trap filled with armed samurais.
  • Fans expressed excitement, with many praising the massy avatar Salman is portraying.
  • Sikandar is set to release in theatres on Eid 2025.
  • The film is produced by Sajid Nadiadwala under Nadiadwala Grandson Entertainment.
“Ab intezaar hua khatam. Here’s presenting a glimpse of the world of Sikandar.” - Film’s producers

In conclusion, the teaser has generated significant buzz among fans, marking a strong follow-up to Salman Khan’s previous works and setting high expectations for its release.

item.title: Labourer killed, actor Urmila Kothare injured in horrific accident in Mumbai - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Actor Urmila Kothare's Car Runs Over Labourers in Mumbai, 1 Killed

Date: Dec 28, 2024 Source: Hindustan Times

In a tragic incident in Kandivali, Mumbai, actress Urmila Kothare's car lost control and hit two Metro workers, resulting in one death and another serious injury.

  • The accident occurred while Kothare was returning from work near Poisar Metro station.
  • One labourer died on the spot, while the other sustained severe injuries.
  • Both the actress and her driver suffered minor injuries due to airbags deploying.
  • The police have filed a case against the driver and initiated an investigation.
“Urmila Kothare's car hit two labourers who were engaged in Metro rail work under the Poisar Metro station…” - Police Official

The incident has raised concerns about road safety, particularly following other recent accidents in Mumbai. An investigation is underway to determine the cause.

item.title: Sikandar teaser OUT! Salman Khan is set to woo fans with a grand, massy entertainer co-starring Rashmika - TOI Etimes
item.description:
Sikandar teaser OUT! Salman Khan battles samurais in this grand, massy entertainer co-starring Rashmika Mandanna: video inside

Publication Date: N/A Source: Times of India

The teaser for the much-anticipated film 'Sikandar' has been released after a brief delay due to notable events. Salman Khan is seen in action, battling futuristic goons.

  • The teaser was initially set to release on Salman Khan's birthday, December 27, but was postponed.
  • Salman Khan's character is showcased fighting samurais and futuristic enemies.
  • The film features Rashmika Mandanna alongside Salman Khan.
  • Fans have expressed great excitement and positive reactions towards the teaser.
A fan stated, "Sikandar will create a havoc at Box Office 🔥It's a very emotional moment for every Salman Khan Die Heart Fan to see him directed by talented South Directors..."

In conclusion, the release of the 'Sikandar' teaser has stirred enthusiasm among fans, setting high expectations ahead of its release.

item.title: Watch: Israel deploys US THAAD system for first time - what is it - The Times of India
item.description:
Israel Deploys US THAAD System for First Time

Publication Date: October 2023

Source: Times of Israel

This article discusses Israel's recent deployment of the US THAAD (Terminal High Altitude Area Defense) system, marking its first operational use. The THAAD system is designed to protect against short, medium, and intermediate-range ballistic missiles.

  • The THAAD system was deployed amidst growing regional tensions.
  • This marks a significant step in Israel's missile defense strategy.
  • The system's effectiveness in real-world scenarios is yet to be fully evaluated.
“The deployment of THAAD is a crucial enhancement to our defense capabilities,” said an Israeli military official.

In conclusion, the THAAD deployment symbolizes a deepening military cooperation between the US and Israel and reflects the ongoing threats in the region.

item.title: Nitish Kumar Reddy given free food, clothes, accommodation; dad requested ex-BCCI selector: 'He came to me and said...' - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Nitish Kumar Reddy Achieves Historic Century in Boxing Day Test

Publication Date: December 28, 2024 Source: Hindustan Times

Nitish Kumar Reddy made headlines by scoring his first Test century against Australia, leading his team from a precarious position to a celebrated win.

  • Reddy scored a pivotal century against a challenging bowling attack including Pat Cummins and Mitchell Starc.
  • MSK Prasad, former chief selector, expressed deep emotional pride regarding Reddy's performance.
  • Reddy’s father felt overwhelmed, witnessing his son's remarkable achievement from the stands.
  • Reddy has consistently performed well in the Border-Gavaskar Trophy, showcasing his potential as a rising star.
  • MSK Prasad highlighted how Reddy was groomed through systematic training from a young age.
“I think he stepped up to the occasion... He has raised his level and made a mark.” - MSK Prasad

This monumental achievement not only reflects Reddy's hard work and perseverance but also sets the stage for a promising future in international cricket.

item.title: Due to poor collections, shows of Baby John replaced with Hindi version of Marco; Industry SHOCKED as PVR Inox Pictures manages to release Varun Dhawan-starrer in just 4 out of 275 single screens in CP Berar - Bollywood Hungama
item.description:
Baby John Faces Poor Box Office Performance; Shows Replaced by Hindi Version of Marco

Publication Date: December 25, 2024 | Source: Bollywood Hungama

The film Baby John, starring Varun Dhawan, has had a disappointing start at the box office with collections dropping dramatically. As a result, many theaters have begun replacing its shows with the Hindi version of Marco.

  • Opening day collection: Rs. 11.25 crores.
  • Second day drop to Rs. 5.13 crores.
  • Predicted weekend collection could be under Rs. 30 crores.
  • The film's shows are being replaced by Marco, Pushpa 2, and Mufasa: The Lion King.
  • Only 4 out of 275 single-screen theaters in CP Berar are showing Baby John.
“On Thursday, the film suffered a huge drop which made it clear for the exhibitors that it won’t even grow on Friday.”

This situation raises concerns about distribution strategies and the future of films in theatrical releases as audiences clearly show preference for other titles.

item.title: Carlsen Quits Rapid & Blitz Championships; Murzin, Duda, Arjun, Grischuk Lead Open - Chess.com
item.description:
Carlsen Quits Rapid & Blitz Championships; Murzin, Duda, Arjun, Grischuk Lead Open

Publication Date: December 28, 2024
Source: Chess.com

Magnus Carlsen has announced he will not continue in the 2024 FIDE World Rapid and Blitz Championships due to a disagreement with FIDE regarding dress code regulations. This decision ensures new champions will be crowned this year.

  • Carlsen finishes the Rapid Championship with a score of 5/8.
  • Leading the Open championship are GM Volodar Murzin, Jan-Krzysztof Duda, Arjun Erigaisi, and Alexander Grischuk with a score of 7/9.
  • Carlsen received a $200 fine for violating the dress code.
  • Chief Arbiter confirmed Carlsen wasn't forced out but he chose to leave.
  • The women's championship sees Ju Wenjun, Harika Dronavalli, and Koneru Humpy at the top with a score of 6.5/8.

My patience with them was not very big to begin with. It's fine, then I'm out, then f**k you.

—Magnus Carlsen

FIDE reiterated the importance of adhering to dress codes for maintaining professionalism and an equal playing field.

item.title: Vodafone Group clears about Rs 11,650 cr dues raised against VIL shares - Business Standard
item.description:
Vodafone Clears Rs 11,650 Crore Dues from VIL Shares

Publication Date: Dec 28 2024 | Source: Press Trust of India

UK-based Vodafone Group has successfully cleared dues of approximately Rs 11,650 crore against shares of Vodafone Idea Limited (VIL), reaffirming its financial commitments.

  • Vodafone had pledged nearly its entire stake in VIL to secure the debt.
  • The dues were cleared as of December 27, 2024, through HSBC Corporate Trustee Company (UK).
  • The shares in question are valued at around Rs 11,649 crore based on the closing price of Rs 7.41 per share.
  • Vodafone holds a 22.56% stake in VIL, while Aditya Birla Group and the government hold 14.76% and 23.15% shares respectively.
"Consequently, the indirect encumbrance on 15,720,826,860 equity shares... has been released."

This clearance demonstrates Vodafone's ongoing strategy to stabilize its finances and potentially strengthen its position in the Indian telecom market.

item.title: OnePlus Open 2 alleged leaks suggest upgraded design, IPX8 rating, and Snapdragon 8 Elite SoC | Mint - Mint
item.description:
OnePlus Open 2 alleged leaks suggest upgraded design, IPX8 rating, and Snapdragon 8 Elite SoC

Publication Date: Not specified; Source: Live Mint

Tech giant OnePlus is reportedly gearing up to launch the OnePlus Open 2, a successor to its 2023 foldable model, scheduled for early next year. Leaks suggest significant upgrades in design and specifications.

  • Refined design featuring a larger circular camera module with a rearranged triple-camera setup.
  • IPX8 water resistance rating, an improvement over the IPX4 rating of its predecessor.
  • Powered by Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset, with options for up to 16GB RAM and 1TB storage.
  • Display specs include an 8-inch LTPO main screen with 2K resolution and 120Hz refresh rate.
  • Expected camera capabilities: triple 50MP rear sensors and dual selfie cameras (32MP and 20MP).
  • 5,900mAh battery with 80W wired fast charging support.

As OnePlus prepares for the global launch of its flagship OnePlus 13 on January 7, 2025, the OnePlus 12 has also seen a price reduction, making it an attractive option for buyers seeking a premium smartphone at a lower cost.

item.title: Arvind Kejriwal accuses BJP of blocking welfare schemes in Delhi, vows to implement Mahila Samman and San - The Times of India
item.description:
Kejriwal Accuses BJP of Hindering Welfare Initiatives in Delhi

Date: October 2023

Source: Times of India

Delhi Chief Minister Arvind Kejriwal has accused the BJP government of obstructing key welfare schemes aimed at empowering women and providing healthcare in the nation’s capital.

  • Kejriwal criticized the BJP for stalling the implementation of the Mahila Samman Yojana and Sanjeevani Yojana.
  • He vowed to push forward with these initiatives regardless of the political obstacles.
  • The Chief Minister emphasized the importance of these schemes in improving the lives of women and providing essential health services.
“We will not let the BJP hinder our welfare schemes. The people of Delhi deserve these benefits.”

In summary, Kejriwal's firm stance against the BJP highlights the ongoing political tensions while reaffirming his commitment to welfare in Delhi.

item.title: Arvind Kejriwal Slams BJP Over Blockage of Welfare Schemes in Delhi - The Times of India
item.description:
Kejriwal Accuses BJP of Blocking Welfare Schemes in Delhi

Publication Date: October 2023 Source: Times of India

In a recent address, Delhi Chief Minister Arvind Kejriwal accused the BJP of obstructing welfare schemes in the capital while pledging to implement welfare initiatives such as the Mahila Samman and Sanjeevani Yojana.

  • Kejriwal states the BJP's actions hinder welfare programs aimed at the marginalized.
  • He emphasized the importance of women's empowerment through the Mahila Samman initiative.
  • The Sanjeevani Yojana aims to enhance healthcare services in Delhi.
  • Kejriwal's statements reflect ongoing political tensions between his party and the BJP.
“We are committed to ensuring that these welfare schemes reach the people who need them the most.” - Arvind Kejriwal

This statement highlights Kejriwal's commitment to social welfare amidst political challenges, emphasizing the government's focus on uplifting women and improving healthcare.

item.title: Study shows shocking link between hair products and cancer; here are the details - The Week
item.description:
Study shows shocking link between hair products and cancer; here are the details

Publication Date: 2024 Source: European Journal of Obstetrics and Gynaecology and Reproductive Biology

This article discusses a recent study highlighting the risks associated with chemicals in hair dyes and chemical straighteners, including potential links to breast and ovarian cancer.

  • A study published in 2024 indicates that hair products often contain harmful chemicals.
  • These chemicals can disrupt hormones and are associated with cancer risks.
  • Common harmful chemicals include aromatic amines, parabens, and formaldehyde.
  • Women are at greater risk due to higher usage of these products.
  • Recommendations include minimizing the use of such products and opting for safer alternatives.
“Hair products often contain chemicals…giving rise to concerns about the possible adverse effects such as hormonal disturbances and carcinogenicity.”

In conclusion, increased awareness and caution are essential for consumers regarding the use of chemical-laden hair products.

item.title: Anna University sexual assault case: Madras High Court says IPS officers team, comprising women only, to probe Chennai sexual assault case - The Hindu
item.description:
Madras High Court Forms Women-Only Team to Investigate Anna University Sexual Assault

Date: December 28, 2024 | Source: The Hindu

The Madras High Court has constituted an all-woman team of IPS officers to investigate the sexual assault of a student at Anna University, along with the leak of the FIR related to the case.

  • The court ordered a Special Investigation Team (SIT) including IPS officers Bhukya Sneha Priya, Ayman Jamal, and S. Brinda.
  • The Tamil Nadu government consented to the formation of the SIT.
  • The court mandated the state to pay ₹25 lakh in compensation to the survivor.
  • It was stated that the university should not collect any fees from the survivor and must provide necessary counseling and assistance.
  • The court directed the government to consider action against the Greater Chennai Commissioner of Police for revealing investigation details prematurely.
  • The judges criticized the wording of the FIR which led to victim-shaming.
  • A technical glitch was cited as the reason for the leak of the FIR.
“When the Constitution does not discriminate between men and women, society cannot dictate how women should conduct themselves.”

The Madras High Court's decision to form an all-women team signifies a step towards ensuring sensitive handling of sexual assault cases in India.

item.title: Inside Salman Khan's Jamnagar birthday bash with family, friends, fireworks, and Anant Ambani - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Inside Salman Khan's Jamnagar Birthday Bash with Family and Friends

Date: Dec 28, 2024 | Source: Hindustan Times

Actor Salman Khan celebrated his 59th birthday in Jamnagar, Gujarat, surrounded by family and friends. The event featured fireworks and was hosted by the Ambanis, with several moments shared on social media.

  • Salman celebrated with family and close friends.
  • Videos and pictures from the birthday bash were widely shared.
  • Deanne Panday shared multiple photos showcasing the birthday festivities.
  • A neon sign and portrayal of love for Salman were prominent features.
  • Friends from the film industry including Varun Dhawan and Ajay Devgn sent their wishes.
  • Salman's notable past films include 'Hum Aapke Hain Koun' and 'Dabangg'.
  • He is set to star in 'Sikandar', releasing during Eid 2025.
“Happy Birthday @beingsalmankhan” - Deanne Panday

Overall, the birthday bash was a heartfelt celebration of Salman Khan’s life, showcasing love and camaraderie among family and friends.
